messages.subject: I'm sick and tired too, Nanci!
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Nanci! I am a shameless lurker on this list, but had to put in my .02 here.  I was also tired of being sick and tired and finally after years of this,
messages.messageBody:
Hey Nanci!

I am a shameless lurker on this list, but had to put in my .02 here. I was
also tired of being sick and tired and finally after years of this, weight
gain, and a plethora of strange symptoms, got a doctor, told him I felt like
dirt and could he please figure out what was wrong with me. A lab visit
later, he told me that I had hypothyroidism. The symptom list read like my
life story and it's easily treated - hurray!

It's just a thought.......

Betsy Wright

Child of the King \o/
Wife to my sweetie, David
Mom/Stepmom to: Michelle, (27yodd), James (14yods), Kelly (10yodd), Zachary
(9yods) and Alannah (6 yodd)
